name: Drury Inn & Suites Amarillo

reviews.title: Okay Hotel
reviews.text: Hotel is located in excellent location. Close to movies, shopping, and dining places. Rooms are average. Hotel was unable to check us in until after 6pm on our day of arrival because housekeeping had not cleaned all the rooms. Very frustrating when you have two kids in the car ready to have some room.

Thank God the Hampton Inn & Suites was sold out. There is NO WAY it could have been nicer than the Drury. After a long day of driving back from a Colorado ski trip, my family was in need of a place to stretch out and sleep good. THIS WAS THE IDEAL PLACE! I walked in and was greeted by a front desk clerk with a huge smile and wonderful attitude. We were booked for relatively cheap in a King Suite that had a king size bed in one room and a sofa sleeper and a recliner in the front room. In the middle was a mini kitchenette. In the morning, we were pleased to get a full hot breakfast buffet with eggs/bacon/sausage/french toast/waffles and many pastries. Also, free wifi was convenient in what was our favorite hotel stay in years. Do NOT Book anywhere else in Amarillo. THIS IS THE PLACE TO STAY!

reviews.text: Got a decent rate on it, was expecting something a little above and beyond given how many five star ratings it got ... it was just ok. Staff was nice, room was motel average, breakfast was substandard, jacuzzi was only half working. Solidly 3 stars with a "I'm sure it's very nice for Amarillo" disclaimer.

reviews.text: We stayed here one night while waiting to have day surgery for our 2 year old. It is a new hotel that we found to be up to the usual Drury standards. Our room was clean, the hotel staff friendly and the overall stay was good. Because of a late arrival and early departure, we didn't get to partake of the other amenities the hotel offers.
reviews.title: Not bad, good value.

description: Drury Hotel offers its guests a variety of free extras – take, for example, our free hot breakfast. At Drury, “hot” means scrambled eggs, biscuits & gravy, sausage and make-your-own Belgian waffles. In the evening, join us at our 5:30 Kickback® for free hot food and cold beverages. Our rotating menu features a variety of hot foods, baked potatoes, garden salad, beer, wine, mixed drinks and more! To burn off all of those free extras, Drury has a 24-hour exercise center and a parking lot to jog around. Lastly, Drury’s free wireless Internet and free long distance calls will ensure you can keep tabs on all of your posse back home. Located minutes from the Palo Duro Canyon State Park and Cadillac Ranch.
